scripts.say: You’ve found it all, nyaa~ Commander, you’re the best! You’re {namecode:98}’s savior.
After all those years, {namecode:98}’s long-cherished wish will come true at last!
After all that hard work, the materials have been collected! Plus all those retrofit blueprints that I’ve been preparing for a long time. I can now finally get “that”!
---Nyaa? Will the Commander help me till the end?
You’re such a good person Commander... fine! All these materials and blueprints are for you! But give “that” to {namecode:98}, and have {namecode:98} join Commander’s fleet!
